releaseNotes:
Version 1.8.6
			- Fixed an issue affecting PortalClient.GetDeviceProcesses()
			- Added PortalClient.PollNowAsync()

			Version 1.8.5
			- v.94 support
			- Added several class properties
			
			Version 1.8.4
			- Fixed broken PortalClient.GetDeviceByDisplayNameAsync()
			- Added several AWS device group types
			
			Version 1.8.3
			- Fixed issue with sdt alert filters
			
			Version 1.8.2
			- Fixed issue with groupsDisabledThisSource

			Version 1.8.1
			- Fixed issue with GetDeviceGroupDataPointConfigurationAsync caused by LogicMonitor endpoint path change

			Version 1.8.0
			Improvements
			- Now targets .NET Standard 2.0
			- Nullable cancellation token support for all PortalClient HTTP calls
			- AccessId/AccessKeySupport e.g. var portalClient = new PortalClient("subdomain", "accessid", "accesskey");
			- Support for all v93 fields
			Breaking changes:
			- OpsNotes all now use the OpsNote class
			- The System.Drawing.Image namespace is no longer used - images are instead returned as byte arrays.  To use this:

			Image image;
			using (var ms = new MemoryStream(await DefaultPortalClient.GetImageByteArrayAsync(imageType)))
			{
			image = Image.FromStream(ms, true, true);
			}

			Version 1.7.6
			Fixed an issue with Debug commands

			Version 1.7.5
			Added CancellationToken support for Debug commands

			Version 1.7.4
			Fixed an issue with ExecuteDebugCommandAndWaitForResultAsync where some queries did not succeed

			Version 1.7.3
			Fixed issue whereby DeviceDataSources would not be returned if the "groupsDisabledThisSource" JSON property was set.

			Version 1.7.2
			Added support for DeviceGroupTypes: Azure/ApplicationGateway and Azure/IoTHub

			Version 1.7.1
			Further improvements to Widget support

			Version 1.7.0
			Some breaking changes after a full review of all fields and classes.
			This is a major new release - we should now have full support for all widgets.
			It is no longer possible to bring back widgets attached to Dashboards.  Please use a second call to retrieve widgets.

			Version 1.6.10
			Fixed time-based escalation chains

			Version 1.6.9
			Fixed broken GetAll<SnmpSysOidMap>()

Version 1.6.8
Uses the REST LogicMonitor API.
Version 1.6 of the API introduces a number of breaking changes over v1.5:
- The "ConfigSources" and "DataSources" namespaces have now been combined into one "LogicModules" namespace.
- The Backup objects reflect this change.
title: LogicMonitor.Api
